message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer. It seems we both see the value in this product. To be fair, my original asking price was a bit ambitious.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,400,000? This represents a significant discount from my initial proposal and recognizes your interest.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
